Was sind deine Aufgaben?\r\n• Du gestalt:
**What are your tasks?**  
- You design attractive modules and software projects for our customer engagement app and associated backend solutions and implement them in an agile manner.  
- Your active participation in the entire development lifecycle, from technical analysis to design creation, code reviews, and system testing, contributes to successful implementation.  
- To ensure the high-quality standards of our applications, you hand them over to the testing department after development.  
- You take care of successful submissions to the respective app stores.  

**What do you bring?**  
- A completed IT education (HTL/FH/University).  
- Professional experience in developing native Android and/or iOS apps is an advantage.  
- Excellent knowledge of common programming languages (Java/Swift/C#) is a must.  
- Familiarity with the necessary tools (Android Studio/Xcode/Git) and confident handling of relational databases and TSQL.  
- Team spirit and enthusiasm, as well as a methodical, precise, and efficient way of working.  

**What can you expect from us?**  
- We are a stable, owner-managed company with more than 20 years of industry experience. As a market leader with international top clients, we use the latest technologies and are a technological pioneer.  
- Flexible working time models with part-time and home office options, as well as time compensation for overtime, provide you with the necessary flexibility.  
- We are a young and highly motivated team with flat hierarchies, short decision-making paths, and strong cohesion. We value open and appreciative collaboration – contributing ideas and thinking outside the box are welcomed and encouraged!  
- Is personal development important to you? It is to us as well. We recognize potential, strengthen your strengths, and create opportunities to support your growth.  
- A daily meal allowance of EUR 6, monthly team events, free coffee, tea, and fruit are available in the fully equipped kitchen.  
- The Hagenberg location offers good transport connections, free parking, e-charging stations, and pool cars for business trips.

**English Translation:**

As a Lead Developer with us, you will be involved in the entire project lifecycle, from effort estimation to deployment, playing an important role in defining stories and tasks, providing technical leadership to the development team, and taking responsibility for technical implementation decisions. Additionally, you will act as an innovation driver, ensuring that our developers stay up to date with the latest technologies.

**YOUR PROFILE**

To successfully fulfill your responsibilities, you should bring the following skills:
- Several years of professional experience in software development with Android (Java and/or Kotlin, Android Studio, Gradle, etc.)
- Completed education in Software Engineering (HTL, FH, or university)
- Someone who enjoys thinking critically, implementing solutions, driving progress, diving into technical developments with full enthusiasm, and inspiring others
- Bonus: Knowledge in .NET/C#, Angular, and/or Flutter

Your Role in the Team

This a Full Remote job, the offer is ava:
**English Translation:**

**This is a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: Austria, Germany**

**Company Description**

Are you passionate about agile software development, excited by end-to-end responsibility, and looking for a pleasant work atmosphere with plenty of room for growth? Welcome to Breuninger!

Breuninger is the leading fashion and lifestyle department store in the premium and luxury segment and has been in the market for 140 years. Across Europe, the Breuninger online shop is the most important touchpoint with our platform and also offers an ever-growing number of digital touchpoints for our customers in physical stores.

In our technology, we believe in "you build it, you run it" and operate our verticalized multichannel platform on AWS. Our teams are responsible for the software architecture themselves. With us, you work cloud-native and are both a hacker and a team player.

You can expect an autonomous team with which you will tackle exciting challenges around our international multichannel platform. Freedom and opportunities for creativity allow you to realize your potential in an agile and trusting environment. We foster transparent, open, and close collaboration with business units, product owners, management, and DevOps teams. This enables us to align our pragmatic working methods with high-quality standards for architecture.

You can find more exciting information at: B-Digital - We are looking for creative thinkers who want to make a difference. (breuninger.com)

**Job Description**

Our distributed teams work in a hybrid model with their colleagues and have the option to work either remotely or from one of our office locations in Stuttgart, Düsseldorf, and Munich, or to meet on-site for team meetings.  
- As an experienced member of our development teams, you will design, plan, and develop complex features for our Flutter-based app with a particular focus on the iOS platform.  
- In our modern cross-platform architecture, you will actively take ownership of your code, drive technical decisions, and set new standards for quality and performance.  
- You will shape the entire development process from architecture to deployment and ensure high-quality, high-performance implementations through your Flutter and iOS expertise.  
- You will develop sophisticated UI components in consideration of the iOS Human Interface Guidelines and optimize them for the Flutter environment.  
- You will work closely with product owners and UX/UI designers, regularly exchange ideas on solutions, and proactively contribute to product development.  
- With your experience, you will estimate and evaluate the effort of complex features, taking into account technical requirements and business impact—always maintaining a balance between technical excellence and economic value.  
- You stay technologically up-to-date, especially in the Flutter and iOS ecosystem, and proactively drive innovations and best practices within the team.  

**Qualifications**  
- You have at least 2 years of experience in Flutter development as well as solid knowledge of Dart and Swift.  
- You are proficient in state management in Flutter (especially BLoC) as well as the concepts of declarative UI development and their best practices.  
- You have extensive experience in developing and integrating REST APIs as well as implementing platform-specific features.  
- You have a deep understanding of iOS UI/UX guidelines and can successfully transfer them to Flutter projects.  
- Your strong communication skills and problem-solving abilities make you a valuable team player.  
- You enjoy sharing your Flutter and iOS expertise with others and advancing your team members' development through mentoring, code reviews, and workshops.  
- You proactively take responsibility for your projects and can empathize well with the needs of end users.  
- You are experienced in agile development methods (Scrum, Kanban) and have experience with open-source technologies in the mobile environment.  

**Additional Information**  

With us, you have the opportunity to work in a modern, agile, and appreciative environment. Does this sound appealing to you? Then you will find a team at Breuninger where you can feel comfortable and make a lasting impact.  

- Attractive salary package with company pension plans and voluntary social benefits such as vacation and Christmas bonuses.  
- 30% employee discount on all products and services, including gastronomy, hairdressers, etc.  
- Personal and professional development opportunities, including leadership development programs.  
- Maximum flexibility with vacation days in the form of additional paid vacation days through salary conversion.  
- Family-friendly working hours for your work-life balance.  
- Corporate benefits and attractive discounts from up to 21,000 companies.  
- Lease a company bike easily and affordably through salary conversion.  

**Have we sparked your interest?**  

Then we should get to know each other quickly.  

If you have any questions, Katrin is happy to assist you at any time.  

We look forward to receiving your compelling online application, including your availability and salary expectations.
